REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0915 reute d f BC-AMOSKEAG-BANK-<AMKG> 03-05 0056

TEXT.TITLE: AMOSKEAG BANK <AMKG> TO ACQUIRE ENTREPO
TEXT.BODY: Amoskeag Bank said it signed an agreement to acquire <Entrepo Financial Resources Inc>, a Philadelphia-based company which leases and remarkets high technology equipment. Terms of the acquisition were not disclosed. It said Entrepo has assets of 20 mln dlrs. Reuter
